description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Alpha Chimp is an action game where you play as a chimp and complete missions to finally challenge the current Alpha. Explore 3D environments and battle other chimp tribes, poachers, loggers and even aliens! The extra "Battle Mode" allows you to select what kind of enemy and what kind of scene you want to battle in, for quick fun mindless play. Try it NOW!
